languages.text: "Отдай приказ одному из своего рода, элантах. Путь Изгоя поведал мне многое, но тайну управления вашими примитивными машинами... оставь себе".
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
languages.original_text: "Отдай приказ одному из своего рода, элантах. Путь Изгоя поведал мне многое, но тайну управления вашими примитивными машинами... оставь себе".

traits.locale_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret of controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret of controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."
"Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

languages.text: «Ordénaselo a uno de los tuyos, elantach. La Senda del Proscrito me ha enseñado muchas cosas, pero puedes guardarte los secretos sobre el control de tus máquinas primitivas».
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Ordénaselo a uno de los tuyos, elantach. La Senda del Proscrito me ha enseñado muchas cosas, pero puedes guardarte los secretos sobre el control de tus máquinas primitivas».

languages.text: “还是指挥你自己的族人吧，外界人。流浪者道途教会了我许多知识，不过，这台原始机器的控制方式我还是不知道为好。”
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: “还是指挥你自己的族人吧，外界人。流浪者道途教会了我许多知识，不过，这台原始机器的控制方式我还是不知道为好。”

languages.text: 「あなたの従者の一人に指示しろ、エランタ。追放者の道は、私に多くのことを教えてくれたが、あなたは原始的な機械を制御するための秘密を秘密のままにしておくだろう」
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの従者の一人に指示しろ、エランタ。追放者の道は、私に多くのことを教えてくれたが、あなたは原始的な機械を制御するための秘密を秘密のままにしておくだろう」

languages.text: « Adressez-vous plutôt à l'un des vôtres, elantach. La Voie de l'Errance m'a beaucoup appris, mais les secrets de fonctionnement de vos machines primitives ne m'intéressent pas le moins du monde. »
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Adressez-vous plutôt à l'un des vôtres, elantach. La Voie de l'Errance m'a beaucoup appris, mais les secrets de fonctionnement de vos machines primitives ne m'intéressent pas le moins du monde. »

languages.text: "Kendi türünden birine emir ver elantach. Yurtsuzun Yolu bana çok şey öğretti ama ilkel makinelerinizi kontrol etmenin sırrını kendinize saklayabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi türünden birine emir ver elantach. Yurtsuzun Yolu bana çok şey öğretti ama ilkel makinelerinizi kontrol etmenin sırrını kendinize saklayabilirsiniz."

languages.text: "Betraut jemanden von Euresgleichen damit, Elantach. Der Weg des Ausgestoßenen hat mich Vieles gelehrt, aber das Geheimnis um die Kontrolle Eurer primitiven Maschinen dürft Ihr für Euch behalten."
languages.original_text: "Command one of your own kind, elantach. The Path of the Outcast has taught me much, but you may keep the secret to controlling your primitive machines to yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Betraut jemanden von Euresgleichen damit, Elantach. Der Weg des Ausgestoßenen hat mich Vieles gelehrt, aber das Geheimnis um die Kontrolle Eurer primitiven Maschinen dürft Ihr für Euch behalten."
